page.title: 13LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Most people spend a lot of time watching television.The favourite programmes for the men are sports programmes.The women mainly like Coronation Street,Brookside and Dallas.Nearly every one in the survey enjoys reading.Many of the women like to do handicrafts like sewing and knitting.Less than 40% of the people go to evening classes,but going to recreation centres is popular mainly for squash and swimming.The people have to travel about 8 miles to the nearest centre.About 40% of the people belong to clubs at the village hall.The least favourite pastime is bingo.Most of the people in Easton would like a pub there.Ellington and Spaldwick already have pubs.One called the THE GEORGE and the other the MERMAID.
